objective: Generate type-safe API client code for frontend-backend communication.
instructions: 1. Analyze the API specification (OpenAPI/Swagger or GraphQL schema). 2. Generate TypeScript interfaces for request/response types. 3. Create API client functions with proper error handling. 4. Implement request interceptors for auth tokens. 5. Add response transformation and error mapping. 6. Include retry logic for transient failures. 7. Generate React Query/SWR hooks if applicable. 8. Add request cancellation support.
client_patterns: - Base client configuration (base URL, headers, timeout) - Request/Response interceptors - Error response handling and mapping - Type-safe method signatures - Query parameter serialization - File upload handling - WebSocket client if needed
output_format: Generate files including: - API client base (api/client.ts) - Resource-specific clients (api/resources/users.ts) - Type definitions (api/types/user.types.ts) - React hooks if applicable (hooks/useUsers.ts) - Mock handlers for testing (mocks/handlers/users.ts)
